name: Persian Dagger, 45cm
description: This Persian latex dagger is perfect for those who wish to reap havoc in the sultan’s court. 45cm A dagger is a necessary piece to have during any larp for self-defense and assassinations and this curved blade makes killing easy.

name: Rondel Dagger, 47cm
description: The rondel dagger was once used to penetrate between the plates in a knight’s armor.  This latex dagger has a wood grain finished handle caped in metal. This straight dagger will fit well in a boot or in any holder.

name: Trident Dagger, 50cm
description: Known for its sword breaking abilities this Latex Trident dagger is used to capture your opponents sword during battle. The dagger traps the sword between the twin short blades and the long center blade preventing your opponent for hurting you. 50cm

name: Bollock Dagger, 45cm
description: The bollocks latex dagger is one usually used by the Vikings or the Celts. A dagger known for its strength and resilience this larp dagger will not disappoint. Its long tapered blade ends with a thick bulky hilt and a leather wrapped handle. 45cm

name: Lorian Dagger, 50cm
description: Always useful to a elf soldier is the latex lorian dagger, which would have probably been given to him by his commander for servitude in the ranks. A blong sculptec yet fluide blade with embeded runes come together in harmony.  50cm.

name: Stiletto Dagger, 47cm
description: The stiletto latex dagger is a long thin straight dagger with a large cross guard. Originally the dagger was used in the renaissance period as a fencing dagger but now it can be used as a  latex parrying dagger. 45cm

name: Elven Dagger, 45cm
description: Our elven latex dagger keeps the same shape and fluidity of the elven sword blades and can be easily concealed. This long sleek blade has no protruding parts making it easy to slip in and out of tight areas and makes for easy killing. 45cm.

name: Tanto Dagger, 40cm
description: A soldier always needs a dagger, and the latex tanto dagger is easy to conceal and goes perfectly with almost any era or civilization. The straight blade resembles that of the samurai but may well have belonged to medieval soldier, either way it will help defend you from villains and thieves. 40cm.

name: Legion Dagger, 45cm
description: Always useful to a roman soldier is the latex legion dagger, which would have probably been given to him by his commander for servitude in the ranks. This simple looking dagger has a broadened tip and a large guard in symmetrical pattern. 45cm

name: Royal Dagger, 45cm
description: The Royal latex larp dagger has a layered gold leaf pattern similar to the high elves and could once have belonged to a lost King. Its noble looks suggests this to be a weapon of royalty and carried at banquets or on travels as a means of defense against would be assassins. 45cm

name: Spartan Dagger, 45cm
description: Any centurion or gladiator will enjoy this foam latex Spartan dagger during their battles. To walk the streets unarmed or enter the coliseum without back-up would be silly and this traditional style dagger will accompany you perfectly on your travels as well as any battle. 45cm.

name: Corsair Dagger, 47cm
description: Cutthroats and pirates’ alike need a boarding weapon that is easily concealed and this corsair latex dagger will do the trick.   The blade on this dagger is unique and has a serrated edge on both sides of the blade ending in a hook to insure death. 45cm.

name: Orc Cutter Dagger, 45cm
description: Whoever says orc’s do not carry daggers will be sadly mistaken when stabbed with this latex Orc cutter dagger. 40cm.  This jagged edged blade has a roughly forged look to it and resembles what those nasty orc’s would possibly make with their limited skills.

name: Spider Dagger, 45cm
description: From the bowels of Loth comes this latex spider dagger. 45cm.  Its serrated blade makes this weapon ideal for the drow and servants of the queen of spiders.  Backstabbing is part of the dark elf culture and this dagger will not disappoint its wielder.

name: Serpent Dagger, 45cm
description: The latex Serpent dagger is similar to tradition ceremonial daggers used for sacrifices.  It’s look insists on obedience and respect and those who wield it. 45cm.
